metadata.synopsis: Flaming Fist Cyril is an elf who feels things deeply. An emotive person, he is positive and tries to see the good in everything.  This dialogue contains several states, including resting, on high alert against ghouls, under attack etc..

0.speaker: Fist Cyril
0.text: I'd offer to help, but with Duke Ravengard missing, we can't spare anyone. I'm sorry.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: sincere and emotive - you care deeply and are worried for the player's loved ones

1.speaker: Fist Cyril
1.text: I knew Marcus well - never suspected a thing.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: <GL> reshoot, last version had almost no movementInternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: blaming yourself for not seeing the signs
